name: Eventually, We Pay
description:
Controls:

WASD to move

E to interact, when prompted

Enter to start typing

M to toggle music

Left Shift to Sprint

You can ask the AI for a hint, by asking for one in the chat

The AI is incredibly simple, so try to keep your questions for it simple too. If it doesn't understand, try again with simpler/fewer words, and if that fails then maybe the AI just doesn't know.

Theme

A very loose interpretation, but what else are GameJams for if not exploring (get it, it's an exploration game ;p) and trying new things out. The game matches the theme, since the less [SPOILER] limbs you have, the more soul shards you get. 

Other

This game was mostly made for me to have a go at doing some proper pixel art, trying out isometric tile sheets, and also to see if I could get anything like a chatbot working with no prior experience.

I hope you enjoy it, and please let me know if you have any issues, or even just anything at all to say about the game :)
